name: Sausage Smackdown
description:
Sausage Smackdown: The Ultimate Sausage Experience.

A two player versus couch experience, involving funny physics-based fights. Don´t try to control the Sausage - be the Sausage.

It's sausage vs. sausage on a grill. Enter the Ring of Fire to the ultimate showdown ... who is the greatest sausage fighter?

Speedlink Competition Pro or similar controllers recommended for maximum fun. Use Button 0 and 1 to grab one of your sausage ends and wiggle them around with the joystick.

Our BBQGameJam entry for 2015, for non commercial use only. Made by Mimimi Productions members Cem Erdalan, Dennis Huszak (freelance), Frieder Mielke and Johannes Roth. Supported by Michael Klier for sounds and all other jammers for play testing.
